name: K.N.O.T. (MatteoGodzilla)
description:
You're Robert, a soldier that has never been called to do any real work even though you're in the army for 3 years.
You finally get your first mission from the Commander, but you start to notice that something is weird.

Game developed as a challenge to myself in order to improve on all the other sides of game development that is not programming. That means visual style, audio effects, level building, animations and so on. Yes it looks like a toddler made this game, you don't have to tell me in the comments.

Video showing the development of the game coming soon :tm:
